scripts.build: rm -rf ../builds/portfolio && mkdir -p ../builds/portfolio/public && parcel build src/index.html --out-dir ../builds/portfolio/dist && cp -R src/unity ../builds/portfolio/dist && cp -R config ../builds/portfolio && cp Procfile ../builds/portfolio
scripts.deploy: cd ../builds/portfolio && git init && ((git remote -v | grep heroku) || git remote add heroku https://git.heroku.com/felipegruoso.git) && git add . && (git commit -m "Deploy" || true) && git push heroku master --force
